      "tld": "...",
      "uuid": "..."
    }
  ],
  "stacked": true,
  "status": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    bullet array of Bullet
    code string
    description string
    descriptionHtml string
    exclusive boolean
    id number
    name string
    paymentPlan array of PaymentPlan
    stacked boolean
    status string
    uuid string

    AttributeGroup

    Group of product attributes

    {
  "attribute": [
    {
      "id": 12345,
      "name": "...",
      "numTaggedProducts": 12345
    },
    {
      "id": 12345,
      "name": "...",
      "numTaggedProducts": 12345
    }
  ],
  "id": 12345,
  "name": "...",
  "showOnNavigation": true,
  "vendorTaggable": true
}
    Property Type Description
    attribute array of Attribute List of product attributes
    id number Id
    name string Name
    showOnNavigation boolean Show the attribute group in the navigation panel
    vendorTaggable boolean Attribute group can be used to tag products by vendor

    AttributeType

    Enumeration of:

    • TEXT
    • MULTISELECT

    Attribute

    Traits that the products share in common, such as the product type, the supported operating system or how your marketplace promotes them.

    {
  "id": 12345,
  "name": "...",
  "numTaggedProducts": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    id number Id
    name string The name
    numTaggedProducts number The number of products that use this attribute

    Author

    Author of a question, an answer, a review or a review comment

    {
  "name": "...",
  "profilePicUrl": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    name string Name
    profilePicUrl string Profile pic URL
    uuid string Unique identifier

    BaseOrder

    {
  "_embedded": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  },
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "currency": "...",
  "endDate": 12345,
  "endOfDiscountDate": 12345,
  "frequency": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "nextBillingDate": 12345,
  "referenceCode": "...",
  "salesSupportUser": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "startDate": 12345,
  "status": "...",
  "totalPrice": 12345,
  "type": "...",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    _embedded object
    company Link Link to company information.
    currency string Currency.
    endDate number Order end date.
    endOfDiscountDate number Discount end date.
    frequency string Frequency.
    id number ID.
    links array of Link
    nextBillingDate number Next billing date for the order.
    referenceCode string Reference code.
    salesSupportUser Link Link to sales support user information.
    startDate number Order start date.
    status string Order status.
    totalPrice number Total price for the order.
    type string Type.
    user Link Link to user information.

  "description": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "title": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    description string
    id number
    title string

  "message": "Metered usage report is not allowed on this entitlement.",
  "success": false
}
    Property Type Description
    message string Billing API response.
    success boolean If the Billing API call was successful.

    CreditCardType

    Enumeration of:

    • VISA
    • MASTERCARD
    • AMEX
    • DISCOVER
    • JCB
    • GATEWAY

    CreditCard

    {
  "expirationMonth": 12345,
  "expirationYear": 12345,
  "name": "...",
  "number": "...",
  "securityCode": "...",
  "type": "JCB"
}
    Property Type Description
    expirationMonth number Expiration month. Required field.
    expirationYear number Expiration year. Required field.
    name string Name as it appears on credit card. Required field.
    number string Credit card number. Required field.
    securityCode string Credit card security code. Required field.
    type CreditCardType Credit card type. Valid types include VISA, MASTERCARD, AMEX, and DISCOVER.

    CustomTemplatesPublishedStatus

    Status applying to all publishable custom styles (e.g. themes, templates). Note: styles is used as an abstract name for customizable artifacts; themes and templates being concrete style types.
    Property Type Description

    CustomThemePublishedStatus
    Property Type Description

    CustomerTagGroup

    Customer tag group

    {
  "customerTags": [
    {
      "id": 12345,
      "name": "...",
      "numTaggedProducts": 12345
    },
    {
      "id": 12345,
      "name": "...",
      "numTaggedProducts": 12345
    }
  ],
  "hideOnNavigation": true,
  "id": 12345,
  "name": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    customerTags array of CustomerTag List of customer tags
    hideOnNavigation boolean Flag to indicate if this customer tag group should be visible in the navigation
    id number ID
    name string The customer tag group name

    CustomerTag

    Customer tag

    {
  "id": 12345,
  "name": "...",
  "numTaggedProducts": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    id number ID
    name string Name
    numTaggedProducts number Number of product tagged by this customer tag

  "discountedStartingPrice": "...",

    "DKK": 12345,
    "EUR": 12345,
    "GBP": 12345,
    "GTQ": 12345,
    "INR": 12345,
    "JPY": 12345,
    "KRW": 12345,
    "MXN": 12345,
    "MYR": 12345,
    "NOK": 12345,
    "NZD": 12345,
    "PHP": 12345,
    "SAR": 12345,
    "SEK": 12345,
    "SGD": 12345,
    "USD": 12345,
    "ZAR": 12345
  },
  "highestPercentageDiscount": 12345,
  "startingPricePercentageDiscount": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    discountedStartingPrice string
    highestFixedDiscount Price
    highestPercentageDiscount number
    startingPricePercentageDiscount number

        "alignWithParentCycleStartDate": true,
        "autoExtensionPricingId": 12345,
        "blockContractDowngrades": true,

    EventType

    Enumeration of:

    • SUBSCRIPTION_ORDER
    • SUBSCRIPTION_CHANGE
    • SUBSCRIPTION_CANCEL
    • SUBSCRIPTION_NOTICE
    • USER_ASSIGNMENT
    • USER_UNASSIGNMENT
    • USER_UPDATED
    • ADDON_ORDER
    • ADDON_CHANGE
    • ADDON_CANCEL
    • ADDON_BIND
    • ADDON_UNBIND

    Event

    A subscription related integration event

    {
  "asynchronous": true,
  "company": {
    "companyId": "...",
    "links": [
      {
        "href": "...",
        "rel": "..."
      },
      {
        "href": "...",
        "rel": "..."
      }
    ],
    "name": "..."
  },
  "consumed": true,
  "creationDate": 12345,
  "error": {
    "code": "...",
    "message": "..."
  },
  "manuallyResolved": true,
  "orderId": 12345,
  "product": {
    "links": [
      {
        "href": "...",
        "rel": "..."
      },
      {
        "href": "...",
        "rel": "..."
      }
    ],
    "name": "...",
    "productId": 12345
  },
  "subscriptionId": 12345,
  "successful": true,
  "type": "SUBSCRIPTION_CHANGE",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    asynchronous boolean Whether the event is asynchronous or not
    company CompanyWS Company information
    consumed boolean Whether the event has been consumed by vendor or not
    creationDate number Date when the event was created
    error ErrorWS Error message in case the event fails
    manuallyResolved boolean Whether the event has been manually resolved
    orderId number Order id
    product Product Production information
    subscriptionId number Subscription id
    successful boolean If the event is consumed, then whether it's successful or not
    type EventType Event type
    uuid string Unique event identifier

  "title": "..."

  "avs": true,
  "code": "...",

  "message": "..."

    Property Type Description

    code string Code.
    cvv boolean True if credit card is validated.

    InvoiceLineType

    Enumeration of:

    • ITEM
    • DISCOUNT
    • TAX
    • DELEGATED_INVOICE
    • TERMINATION_FEE
    • SUB_ACCOUNT

    InvoiceLine

    {
  "description": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "itemId": 12345,
  "percentage": 12345,
  "periodEnd": 12345,
  "periodStart": 12345,
  "price": 12345,
  "quantity": 12345,
  "total": 12345,
  "type": "SUB_ACCOUNT"
}
    Property Type Description
    description string Description
    id number ID
    itemId number Item id
    percentage number Percentage
    periodEnd number Period end
    periodStart number Period start
    price number Item price
    quantity number Quantity
    total number Total
    type InvoiceLineType Invoice line type. May be ITEM, DISCOUNT, TAX, DELEGATED_INVOICE,
    TERMINATION_FEE or SUB_ACCOUNT;

    InvoiceListing

    {
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "creationDate": 12345,
  "currency": "SAR",
  "dueDate": 12345,
  "invoiceId": 12345,
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "referenceNumber": "...",
  "status": "UNPAID",
  "total": 12345,
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    company Link Link to company information.
    creationDate number Creation date for the invoice.
    currency Currency Currency.
    dueDate number Due date for the invoice.
    invoiceId number Invoice ID.
    links array of Link
    referenceNumber string Reference number.
    status InvoiceStatus Invoice status. May be PAID, UNPAID, CARRIED or VOIDED.
    total number Invoice total.
    user Link Link to user information.

    InvoiceStatus

    Enumeration of:

    • PAID
    • UNPAID
    • CARRIED
    • VOIDED

    Invoice

    {
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "creationDate": 12345,
  "currency": "KRW",
  "delegatedToInvoice": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "dueDate": 12345,
  "includedInvoices": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "id": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "id": "..."
    }
  ],
  "invoiceId": 12345,
  "invoiceLines": [
    {
      "description": "...",
      "id": 12345,
      "itemId": 12345,
      "percentage": 12345,
      "periodEnd": 12345,
      "periodStart": 12345,
      "price": 12345,
      "quantity": 12345,
      "total": 12345,
      "type": "ITEM"
    },
    {
      "description": "...",
      "id": 12345,
      "itemId": 12345,
      "percentage": 12345,
      "periodEnd": 12345,
      "periodStart": 12345,
      "price": 12345,
      "quantity": 12345,
      "total": 12345,
      "type": "TAX"
    }
  ],
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "referenceNumber": "...",
  "status": "VOIDED",
  "total": 12345,
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    company Link Link to company information.
    creationDate number Creation date for the invoice.
    currency Currency Currency.
    delegatedToInvoice Link Link to the delegated invoice
    dueDate number Due date for the invoice.
    includedInvoices array of Link List of links to the included invoices
    invoiceId number Invoice ID.
    invoiceLines array of InvoiceLine List of Invoice lines
    links array of Link
    referenceNumber string Reference number.
    status InvoiceStatus Invoice status. May be PAID, UNPAID, CARRIED or VOIDED.
    total number Invoice total.
    user Link Link to user information.

    Link

    {
  "href": "...",
  "rel": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    href string
    rel string

    {
  "href": "...",
  "id": "..."
}

    id string

    NotificationCommonElementDefinition
    Property Type Description
    methods array of NotificationMethod Notification methods(Email, sms)
    position Position Position of the element in the template(Top, bottom)
    type NotificationCommonElementType Notification common element type

    NotificationCommonElementType

    Enumeration of:

    • UNSUBSCRIBE

    NotificationCommonEmailElementWS
    Property Type Description
    content string Email notification content
    defaultCommonElement boolean If the elements are default common elements
    enabled boolean If the email template is enabled
    id number Email notification template ID
    locale string Email notification locale to determine the language
    partner string Partner being used to render the email
    type NotificationCommonElementType Email notification common element type

    NotificationEmailTemplateWS
    Property Type Description
    content string Email notification content
    defaultTemplate boolean If the template is a default template of it's kind
    directSales boolean If the template is used for a direct sale product
    enabled boolean If the email template is enabled
    fallbackEmailTemplateId number The ID of the template to fallback to if current one is disabled or not existing
    id number Email notification template ID
    locale string Email notification locale to determine the language
    partner string Partner being used to render the email
    reminderPattern string Notification reminder pattern
    subject string Email notification subject
    type NotificationTemplateType Email notification template type

    NotificationMethod

    Enumeration of:

    • EMAIL
    • SMS

    NotificationMethodTemplate
    Property Type Description
    enabled boolean If notification method is enabled
    method NotificationMethod Notification method(Email or sms)

    NotificationSmsTemplateWS
    Property Type Description
    content string SMS notification content
    directSales boolean If the template is used for a direct sale product
    enabled boolean If the SMS template is enabled
    id number SMS notification template ID
    locale string SMS notification locale to determine the language
    type NotificationTemplateType SMS notification template type

    NotificationTemplateCategory

    Enumeration of:

    • ACCOUNTS
    • PRODUCTS
    • VENDORS
    • BILLING
    • MARKETPLACE
    • DOMAIN_REGISTRATION
    • ASSISTED_SALES
    • MISC

    NotificationTemplateDefinition
    Property Type Description
    audience NotificationAudienceType Notification audienceType(New user, existing user, etc)
    category NotificationTemplateCategory Notification template category(Billing, account, etc)
    generated boolean If the template body is generated
    methods array of NotificationMethodTemplate Notification methods(Email, sms)
    reminder NotificationReminderType Notification reminder type
    required boolean If the template can be disabled or not
    type NotificationTemplateType Notification template type

    NotificationTemplateParameter
    Property Type Description
    parameterName string Notification template parameter name
    type NotificationParameterType Notification template parameter type(USERNAME, CHANNEL NAME, etc)
    valueType NotificationParameterValueType Notification parameter value type(single value, collections, etc)

    • WHOLESALES_PRICE_RESELLER_MANAGER_ACTION_PENDING_PRICE_REQUESTED
    • WHOLESALES_PRICE_RESELLER_MANAGER_ACTION_PENDING_PRICE_REQUESTED_FOR_CHANNEL_ADMIN
    • API_ALERT
    • WELCOME_USER
    • CREDIT_CARD_REQUIRED

    OrderContract

    {}
    Property Type Description

    OrderLine

    {}
    Property Type Description

    OrderListing

    {
  "_embedded": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  },
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "currency": "...",
  "endDate": 12345,
  "endOfDiscountDate": 12345,
  "frequency": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "nextBillingDate": 12345,
  "paymentPlan": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "referenceCode": "...",
  "salesSupportUser": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "startDate": 12345,
  "status": "...",
  "totalPrice": 12345,
  "type": "...",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    _embedded object
    company Link Link to company information.
    currency string Currency.
    endDate number Order end date.
    endOfDiscountDate number Discount end date.
    frequency string Frequency.
    id number ID.
    links array of Link
    nextBillingDate number Next billing date for the order.
    paymentPlan Link Link to the payment plan
    referenceCode string Reference code.
    salesSupportUser Link Link to sales support user information.
    startDate number Order start date.
    status string Order status.
    totalPrice number Total price for the order.
    type string Type.
    user Link Link to user information.

  "_embedded": {

    "contract": {
      "alignWithParentCycleStartDate": true,
      "autoExtensionPricingId": 12345,
      "blockContractDowngrades": true,
      "blockContractUpgrades": true,
      "blockSwitchToShorterContract": true,
      "cancellationPeriodLimit": 12345,
      "endOfContractGracePeriod": 12345,
      "gracePeriod": {},
      "minimumServiceLength": 12345,
      "terminationFee": {}
    },
    "cost": [
      {
        "amount": {},
        "blockContractDecrease": true,
        "blockContractIncrease": true,
        "blockOriginalContractDecrease": true,
        "editionPricingItemId": 12345,
        "id": 12345,
        "increment": 12345,
        "maxUnits": 12345,
        "meteredUsage": true,
        "minUnits": 12345,
        "pricePerIncrement": true,
        "pricingStrategy": "...",
        "unit": "...",
        "unitDependency": "..."
      },
      {
        "amount": {},
        "blockContractDecrease": true,
        "blockContractIncrease": true,
        "blockOriginalContractDecrease": true,
        "editionPricingItemId": 12345,
        "id": 12345,
        "increment": 12345,
        "maxUnits": 12345,
        "meteredUsage": true,
        "minUnits": 12345,
        "pricePerIncrement": true,
        "pricingStrategy": "...",
        "unit": "...",
        "unitDependency": "..."
      }
    ],
    "discount": {
      "amount": {},
      "availableRedemptions": 12345,
      "description": "...",
      "expirationDate": 12345,
      "numOfBillingCycles": 12345,
      "percentage": 12345,
      "pricingUnit": "ATTENDEE",
      "startDate": 12345
    },
    "frequency": "...",
    "href": "...",
    "id": 12345,
    "isPrimaryPrice": true,
    "keepBillDateOnUsageChange": true,
    "primaryPrice": true,
    "separatePrepaid": true,
    "tld": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "paymentPlanId": 12345,
  "previousOrder": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "referenceCode": "...",
  "salesSupportUser": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "startDate": 12345,
  "status": "...",
  "totalPrice": 12345,
  "type": "...",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    _embedded object
    activated boolean True if the subscription has been activated
    company Link Link to company information.
    contract OrderContract Contract for this order (optional)
    currency string Currency.
    customAttribute array of CustomAttribute List of custom attributes applying to this order.
    discount Link Link to the discount applied to this order (optional)
    discountId number The unique identifier for the discount applied to this order
    endDate number Order end date.
    endOfDiscountDate number Discount end date.
    frequency string Frequency.
    id number ID.
    links array of Link
    nextBillingDate number Next billing date for the order.
    nextOrder Link Link to the next order for this subscription
    oneTimeOrder array of OrderListing List of one time orders applying to this subscription order
    orderLine array of OrderLine List of order lines for this subscription order
    parameter array of Parameter List of custom parameters applying to this order.
    paymentPlan PaymentPlan Payment plan for this order
    paymentPlanId number The unique identifier for the payment plan for this order
    previousOrder Link Link to the previous order for this subscription
    referenceCode string Reference code.
    salesSupportUser Link Link to sales support user information.
    startDate number Order start date.
    status string Order status.
    totalPrice number Total price for the order.
    type string Type.
    user Link Link to user information.

    OriginApi

    Enumeration of:

    • MOSI
    • CREST
    • null

    systemRequirements string
    versions XmlMappableMultiValueMap

    PaymentInstrument

    {
  "accountDisplay": "...",
  "billingAddress": {
    "city": "...",
    "companyName": "...",
    "country": "...",
    "fax": "...",
    "faxExtension": "...",
    "firstName": "...",
    "lastName": "...",
    "phone": "...",
    "phoneExtension": "...",
    "poBox": "...",
    "salutation": "...",
    "state": "...",
    "street1": "...",
    "street2": "...",
    "zip": "..."
  },
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "createdOn": 12345,
  "creditCard": {
    "expirationMonth": 12345,
    "expirationYear": 12345,
    "name": "...",
    "number": "...",
    "securityCode": "...",
    "type": "GATEWAY"
  },
  "id": "...",
  "isDefault": true,
  "parameters": {
    "approvedTBillInfo": {
      "company": "...",
      "createdByCompany": 12345,
      "createdByUser": 12345,
      "createdOn": 12345,
      "lastModified": 12345,
      "nnsa": "...",
      "rejected": true,
      "repFirstName": "...",
      "repLastName": "...",
      "repPONumber": "...",
      "tan": "..."
    },
    "billingId": "...",
    "creditsAccountId": 12345,
    "externalId": "...",
    "gatewayKey": "...",
    "invoicingEmail": "...",
    "issuer": "...",
    "manoTEOBillingId": "...",
    "maskedPan": "...",
    "paymentMethod": "...",
    "paymentToken": "...",
    "processUrl": "...",
    "transactionId": "...",
    "unapprovedTBillInfo": {
      "company": "...",
      "createdByCompany": 12345,
      "createdByUser": 12345,
      "createdOn": 12345,
      "lastModified": 12345,
      "nnsa": "...",
      "rejected": true,
      "repFirstName": "...",
      "repLastName": "...",
      "repPONumber": "...",
      "tan": "..."
    }
  },
  "paymentMethod": "TOICLEARING",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "vatId": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    accountDisplay string Account display text.
    billingAddress BillingAddress Billing address.
    company Link Link to company information.
    createdOn number Payment instrument creation date.
    creditCard CreditCard Credit card information.
    id string ID
    isDefault boolean True if this payment instrument is the default.
    parameters CustomParameters Custom parameters for this payment instrument.
    paymentMethod PaymentMethod Payment method. Most often CREDIT_CARD, PAYPAL, or MANUAL. Other options are supported.
    user Link Link to user information.
    vatId string VAT ID.

    PaymentMethod

    Enumeration of:

    • CREDIT_CARD
    • PAYPAL
    • MANUAL
    • EXTERNAL_INVOICE
    • MARKETPLACE_CREDITS

    PaymentPlan

    {
  "allowCustomUsage": true,
  "contract": {
    "alignWithParentCycleStartDate": true,
    "autoExtensionPricingId": 12345,
    "blockContractDowngrades": true,
    "blockContractUpgrades": true,
    "blockSwitchToShorterContract": true,
    "cancellationPeriodLimit": 12345,
    "endOfContractGracePeriod": 12345,
    "gracePeriod": {
      "length": 12345,
      "unit": "..."
    },
    "minimumServiceLength": 12345,
    "terminationFee": {
      "description": "...",
      "flatFee": {},
      "percentageFee": 12345,
      "type": "..."
    }
  },
  "cost": [
    {
      "amount": {
        "AUD": 12345,
        "BRL": 12345,
        "CAD": 12345,
        "CHF": 12345,
        "CNY": 12345,
        "DKK": 12345,
        "EUR": 12345,
        "GBP": 12345,
        "GTQ": 12345,
        "INR": 12345,
        "JPY": 12345,
        "KRW": 12345,
        "MXN": 12345,
        "MYR": 12345,
        "NOK": 12345,
        "NZD": 12345,
        "PHP": 12345,
        "SAR": 12345,
        "SEK": 12345,
        "SGD": 12345,
        "USD": 12345,
        "ZAR": 12345
      },
      "blockContractDecrease": true,
      "blockContractIncrease": true,
      "blockOriginalContractDecrease": true,
      "editionPricingItemId": 12345,
      "id": 12345,
      "increment": 12345,
      "maxUnits": 12345,
      "meteredUsage": true,
      "minUnits": 12345,
      "pricePerIncrement": true,
      "pricingStrategy": "...",
      "unit": "...",
      "unitDependency": "..."
    },
    {
      "amount": {
        "AUD": 12345,
        "BRL": 12345,
        "CAD": 12345,
        "CHF": 12345,
        "CNY": 12345,
        "DKK": 12345,
        "EUR": 12345,

    PaymentResult

    Enumeration of:

    • SUCCESSFUL
    • FAILED
    • GATEWAY_NOT_AVAILABLE
    • MANUAL

    Payment

    {
  "amount": 12345,
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "currency": "INR",
  "date": 12345,
  "gatewayResponse": {
    "avs": true,
    "code": "...",
    "cvv": true,
    "message": "..."
  },
  "id": 12345,
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "method": "MARKETPLACE_CREDITS",
  "result": "GATEWAY_NOT_AVAILABLE",
  "transactionId": "...",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    amount number Payment amount.
    company Link Link to company information.
    currency Currency Payment currency.
    date number Payment date.
    gatewayResponse GatewayResponse Gateway response
    id number Payment number.
    links array of Link
    method PaymentMethod Payment method. Includes CREDIT_CARD, PAYPAL, and MANUAL.
    result PaymentResult Payment result. May be SUCCESSFUL, FAILED , GATEWAY_NOT_AVAILABLE, or MANUAL.
    transactionId string Transaction ID.
    user Link Link to user information.

    • REQUESTED

    Provider

    {
  "name": "...",
  "url": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    name string
    url string
    uuid string

    PurchaseRestriction

    Product that an user cannot buy because of restrictions of a currently/previously owned product or because other products are required

    {
  "appId": 12345,
  "appName": "...",
  "browsedEditionId": 12345,
  "ownedEditionId": 12345,
  "ownedEditionName": "...",
  "requiredAppEdition": [
    {
      "appId": 12345,
      "appName": "...",
      "editionId": 12345,
      "editionName": "..."
    },
    {
      "appId": 12345,
      "appName": "...",
      "editionId": 12345,
      "editionName": "..."
    }
  ],
  "restrictionType": "...",
  "upcomingSubscription": true
}
    Property Type Description
    appId number Non-purchasable application ID
    appName string Non-purchasable application name
    browsedEditionId number Browed edition ID
    If browsedEdition is null than restrict the entire app
    ownedEditionId number Owned edition ID
    ownedEditionName string Owned edition name
    requiredAppEdition array of AppEdition Required editions to purchase browsed edition
    restrictionType string The type of restriction applied. Null if the type is unknown. For example: If the account is in transition
    upcomingSubscription boolean Is upcoming subscription

    QuestionAnswer

    Answer to a question on a product

    {
  "author": {
    "name": "...",
    "profilePicUrl": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "comment": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "lastModified": 12345,
  "official": true
}
    Property Type Description
    author object Author
    comment string Comment
    id number ID
    lastModified number Last modified date
    official boolean Is the official answer

    Question

    Question on a product

    {
  "answerCount": 12345,
  "author": {
    "name": "...",
    "profilePicUrl": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "comment": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "lastModified": 12345,
  "title": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    answerCount number Number of answers
    author object Author
    comment string Comment
    id number ID
    lastModified number Last modified date
    title string Title

    ReportType

    Enumeration of:

    • CANCELLATIONS
    • PRODUCT_HIERACHY
    • CONTRACT_TERM
    • USAGE
    • CUSTOMER_PROFILE
    • SALES_MAPPING
    • CUSTOMER_BALANCE
    • INVOICES
    • INVOICES_CSV
    • INVOICE_LINES
    • TRANSACTIONS
    • APPLICATION_USAGE
    • TAXES
    • RECONCILIATION
    • FAILED_ORDERS
    • GENERAL_PERFORMANCE_REPORT
    • ACTIVE_UNCONVERTED_USERS
    • MOSI_ACQUISITION_BONUS
    • MOSI_RETENTION_BONUS
    • MOSI_SALES
    • CUSTOMER_RETENTION_BONUS
    • CUSTOMER_ACQUISITION_BONUS
    • FREE_TRIALS
    • SUSPENDED_PURCHASED
    • CUSTOMERS_CSV
    • ORDER_PRODUCTS_CSV
    • ORDER_EDITIONS_CSV
    • PAYMENTS_DETAIL_CSV
    • PAYMENTS_OVERVIEW_CSV
    • COMPANIES_CSV
    • COMPANY_ADMINISTRATORS
    • CANCELLED_ENTITLEMENTS
    • NOT_USED_APP
    • VOICE_CONN_CSV
    • FAILURE_INTEGRATION_EVENT
    • NEXTEL_ORDERS
    • NEXTEL_ACCOUNT_UPDATE
    • NEXTEL_FAILED_PAYMENTS

    • ASSET_D

    • SWISSCOM_SALES_COMMISSION
    • SWISSCOM_RUN_COMMISSION

    • MIGRATION_ENTITY_DATA
    • MIGRATION_ADDON_DATA
    • DT_SALES_COMMISSION
    • VODAFONE_PROVISIONED_ACCOUNTS
    • VFITALY_BILLING_REPORT
    • BILLING_TRANSACTIONS
    • VODAFONE_UNIT_REPORT
    • COMCAST_TRANSACTIONS
    • COMCAST_CANCELLATIONS
    • COMCAST_ORDER_DETAILS
    • COMCAST_ORDER_PRODUCTS_CSV
    • COMCAST_ORDER_EDITIONS_CSV
    • COMCAST_QUOTES
    • COMCAST_PROMOTIONS
    • COMCAST_TRANSACTIONS_NEW
    • COMCAST_APPLICATION_USAGE
    • SPARK_BUDI_INVOICE
    • SPARK_PARTY_NUMBER
    • MELBOURNE_IT_DOMAINS
    • SONERA_INVOICES
    • SONERA_ORDERS
    • INVOICE_PAYMENTS_DETAIL_CSV

    • ROGERS_SALES
    • MAXIS_DAILY_INVOICE_REPORT
    • TIGO_INVOICE_PAYMENTS_DETAIL_CSV

    • TELUS_RECONCILIATION_REPORT
    • MICROSOFT_RECONCILIATION
    • RE_CALCULATE_SUBSCRIPTION_PRICES

    Report

    Single report information for Reporting API

    {
  "createdDate": 12345,
  "endDate": 12345,
  "filename": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "reportType": "CEASE_REASONS",
  "startDate": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    createdDate number Report creation date
    endDate number Period end time of the report
    filename string Report file name
    id number Report ID
    reportType ReportType Report type
    startDate number Period start time of the report

    Reports

    Reports information for reporting API

    {
  "reports": [
    {
      "createdDate": 12345,
      "endDate": 12345,
      "filename": "...",
      "id": 12345,
      "reportType": "VODAFONE_PROVISIONED_ACCOUNTS",
      "startDate": 12345
    },
    {
      "createdDate": 12345,
      "endDate": 12345,
      "filename": "...",
      "id": 12345,
      "reportType": "CUSTOMER_ACQUISITION_BONUS",
      "startDate": 12345
    }
  ],
  "totalCount": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    reports array of Report List of reports
    totalCount number Total count of reports returned by API

    {
  "cost": [
    {
      "amount": {

      "blockContractDecrease": true,
      "blockContractIncrease": true,
      "blockOriginalContractDecrease": true,
      "editionPricingItemId": 12345,
      "id": 12345,
      "increment": 12345,
      "maxUnits": 12345,
      "meteredUsage": true,
      "minUnits": 12345,
      "pricePerIncrement": true,
      "pricingStrategy": "...",
      "unit": "...",
      "unitDependency": "..."
    }
  ],
  "href": "...",
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ]
}
    Property Type Description
    cost array of PlanCost List of plan costs
    href string URL to payment plan details
    links array of Link

  "content": [

      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },

    ReviewComment

    Comment on a review of a product

    {
  "author": {
    "name": "...",
    "profilePicUrl": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "comment": "...",
  "id": 12345,
  "lastModified": 12345,
  "official": true
}
    Property Type Description
    author object Author
    comment string Comment
    id number ID
    lastModified number Last modified date
    official boolean Is an official comment

    Review

    Review on a product

    {
  "author": {
    "name": "...",
    "profilePicUrl": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "comment": "...",
  "commentCount": 12345,
  "id": 12345,
  "lastModified": 12345,
  "rating": 12345,
  "source": "...",
  "title": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    author object Author
    comment string Comment
    commentCount number Number of comment
    id number ID
    lastModified number Last modified date
    rating number Rating
    source string Source
    title string Title

    Screenshot

    {
  "id": 12345,
  "imageUrl": "...",
  "imageUrlSrcset": {
    "property1": "...",
    "property2": "..."
  },
  "name": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    id number
    imageUrl string
    imageUrlSrcset object
    name string

    Source

    {
  "id": 12345,
  "logoUrl": "...",
  "name": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    id number
    logoUrl string
    name string

    usageType string
    uuid string

    Property Type Description

    status ImportStatus

    Status

    Product status

    {
  "assigned": true,
  "companyEntitlementId": 12345,
  "companyEntitlementPending": true,
  "companyWide": true,
  "editionId": 12345,
  "editionName": "...",

    {
      "appId": 12345,
      "appName": "...",
      "browsedEditionId": 12345,
      "ownedEditionId": 12345,
      "ownedEditionName": "...",
      "requiredAppEdition": [
        {
          "appId": 12345,
          "appName": "...",
          "editionId": 12345,
          "editionName": "..."
        },
        {
          "appId": 12345,
          "appName": "...",
          "editionId": 12345,
          "editionName": "..."
        }
      ],
      "restrictionType": "...",
      "upcomingSubscription": true
    },
    {
      "appId": 12345,
      "appName": "...",
      "browsedEditionId": 12345,
      "ownedEditionId": 12345,
      "ownedEditionName": "...",
      "requiredAppEdition": [
        {
          "appId": 12345,
          "appName": "...",
          "editionId": 12345,
          "editionName": "..."
        },
        {
          "appId": 12345,
          "appName": "...",
          "editionId": 12345,
          "editionName": "..."
        }
      ],
      "restrictionType": "...",
      "upcomingSubscription": true
    }
  ],
  "requested": true
}
    Property Type Description
    assigned boolean Is assigned
    companyEntitlementId number Company entitlement ID
    companyEntitlementPending boolean Is company entitlement pending
    companyWide boolean Is company wide
    editionId number Edition ID
    editionName string Edition Name
    freeTrialAllowed boolean Is free trial allowed
    ownerAdmin boolean Owner admin
    ownerFullName string Owner full name
    ownerUuid string Owner unique identifier
    partOfExistingBundle boolean Is part of existing bundle
    pending boolean Is pending
    pendingAppType PendingAppType Pending type
    purchaseRestriction array of PurchaseRestriction List of restrictions
    requested boolean Is requested

    SubCategory

    Subcategory linked to a parent category

    {
  "id": 12345,
  "name": "...",
  "numTaggedProducts": 12345
}
    Property Type Description
    id number The id
    name string The name
    numTaggedProducts number The number of products that belong to this sub category

    SubscriptionListing

    {
  "_embedded": {
    "property1": {},
    "property2": {}
  },
  "assignmentCount": 12345,
  "company": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "creationDate": 12345,
  "edition": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "endDate": 12345,
  "externalAccountId": "...",
  "id": "...",
  "links": [
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    },
    {
      "href": "...",
      "rel": "..."
    }
  ],
  "maxUsers": 12345,
  "order": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "parentSubscriptionId": 12345,
  "product": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "status": "FREE_TRIAL",
  "suspensionReason": "END_OF_CONTRACT",
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    _embedded object
    assignmentCount number Current number of users assigned.
    company Link Link to company information.
    creationDate number Creation date for the subscription.
    edition Link Link to edition information.
    endDate number End date for the subscription.
    externalAccountId string External account ID.
    id string Subscription listing ID.
    links array of Link
    maxUsers number Maximum number of users allowed.
    order Link Link to order information.
    parentSubscriptionId number Parent subscription ID. (Applies to add-on products.)
    product Link Link to product information.
    status CompanyEntitlementStatus Status of the subscription. May be INITIALIZED, FAILED, FREE_TRIAL, FREE_TRIAL_EXPIRED, ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, or CANCELLED.
    suspensionReason CompanyEntitlementSuspensionReason Subscription suspension reason. May be PAYMENT_OVERDUE, END_OF_CONTRACT, UNSUCCESSFUL_PAYMENT, MANUALLY_SUSPENDED, or API
    user Link Link to user information.

    SubscriptionUpdate

    {}
    Property Type Description

    Subscription

    {

      "property1": {},
      "property2": {}
    },
    "activated": true,

      "id": "..."

        {},
        {}
      ],
      "discount": {},
      "frequency": "...",
      "href": "...",
      "id": 12345,
      "isPrimaryPrice": true,
      "keepBillDateOnUsageChange": true,
      "primaryPrice": true,
      "separatePrepaid": true,
      "tld": "...",
      "uuid": "..."
    },
    "paymentPlanId": 12345,
    "previousOrder": {
      "href": "...",
      "id": "..."
    },
    "referenceCode": "...",
    "salesSupportUser": {
      "href": "...",
      "id": "..."
    },
    "startDate": 12345,
    "status": "...",
    "totalPrice": 12345,
    "type": "...",
    "user": {
      "href": "...",
      "id": "..."
    }
  },
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    assignedUsers number Number of users assigned to subscription
    company Link Link to company information
    creationDate number Subscription creation date
    edition Link Link to edition information
    endDate number Subscription end date
    externalAccountId string External account identifier (from vendor)
    id string ID
    internalId string The UUID for a subscription
    maxUsers number Maximum number of users allowed to be assigned to subscription
    order Order Current order
    product Link Link to product information
    redirectUrl string Interactive endpoint URL
    status string Subscription status (Valid values are INITIALIZED, FAILED, FREE_TRIAL, FREE_TRIAL_EXPIRED, ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, or CANCELLED.)
    upcomingOrder Order Upcoming order
    user Link Link to user information

    UserAppInfo

    User application information

    {
  "assigned": true,
  "companyEntitlementId": 12345,
  "companyEntitlementPending": true,
  "companyWide": true,
  "editionId": 12345,
  "editionName": "...",
  "editionPricingId": 12345,
  "freeTrialAllowed": true,
  "freeTrialDaysLeft": 12345,
  "ownerAdmin": true,
  "ownerFullName": "...",
  "ownerId": 12345,
  "ownerUuid": "...",
  "partOfExistingBundle": true,
  "pending": true,
  "pendingAppType": "REQUESTED",
  "requested": true
}
    Property Type Description
    assigned boolean Is assigned
    companyEntitlementId number Company entitlement ID
    companyEntitlementPending boolean Is subscription pending
    companyWide boolean Is company wide
    editionId number Edition ID
    editionName string Edition Name
    editionPricingId number Edition pricing ID
    freeTrialAllowed boolean Free trial allowed
    freeTrialDaysLeft number Free trial days left
    ownerAdmin boolean Is owner admin
    ownerFullName string Owner full name
    ownerId number Owner ID
    ownerUuid string Owner unique identifier
    partOfExistingBundle boolean Is part of existing bundle
    pending boolean Is pending
    pendingAppType PendingAppType Pending app type
    requested boolean Is requested

    UserEntitlementStatusLegacy

    Enumeration of:

    • PENDING_USER_ACTIVATION
    • PENDING_REMOTE_CREATION
    • FAILED
    • ACTIVE
    • PENDING_REMOTE_CANCELLATION
    • CANCELLED

    UserSubscriptionListingWS

    {
  "customAttributes": {
    "property1": "...",
    "property2": "..."
  },
  "externalVendorIdentifier": "...",
  "id": "...",
  "status": "PENDING_REMOTE_CREATION",
  "subscription": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  },
  "user": {
    "href": "...",
    "id": "..."
  }
}
    Property Type Description
    customAttributes object Custom attributes.
    externalVendorIdentifier string External vendor identifier.
    id string ID
    status UserEntitlementStatusLegacy Subscription status for user. May be PENDING_USER_ACTIVATION, PENDING_REMOTE_CREATION,
    FAILED, ACTIVE, PENDING_REMOTE_CANCELLATION, or CANCELLED
    subscription Link Link to subscription information.
    user Link Link to user information.

    VendorCompany

    {
  "name": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    name string
    uuid string

    Webhook

    Represents a Web hook object configuration to push event notifications to registered URLs when specific actions are done on a resource.

    Authentication on the endpoint can be configured to: - None - Authentication token passed in the HTTP header - OAuth2

    {
  "authenticationToken": "...",
  "createdOn": 12345,
  "lastModified": 12345,
  "oauth2Config": {
    "accessTokenUri": "...",
    "clientId": "...",
    "clientSecret": "...",
    "password": "...",
    "username": "..."
  },
  "partner": "...",
  "resourceActions": [
    "CHANGED",
    "CHANGED"
  ],
  "resourceType": "STAGING_PRODUCT",
  "scope": "COMPANY",
  "scopeId": "...",
  "url": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    authenticationToken string Authentication token to be passed in the HTTP header
    createdOn number Creation date
    lastModified number Last modified date
    oauth2Config WebhookOAuth2Config OAuth2 config
    partner string Channel of the webhook
    resourceActions array of WebhookResourceAction Actions done on the resource that triggers the Webhook
    resourceType WebhookResourceType The type of resource the Webhook is for
    scope WebhookScope
    scopeId string
    url string Endpoint to call when an action is done on a resource
    uuid string Unique identifier

    WebhookNotification

    {
  "resource": {
    "content": {},
    "type": "SUBSCRIPTION",
    "url": "...",
    "uuid": "..."
  },
  "resourceAction": "REMOVED",
  "timestamp": 12345,
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    resource WebhookResource
    resourceAction WebhookResourceAction
    timestamp number
    uuid string

    WebhookOAuth2Config

    {
  "accessTokenUri": "...",
  "clientId": "...",
  "clientSecret": "...",
  "password": "...",
  "username": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    accessTokenUri string
    clientId string
    clientSecret string
    password string
    username string

    WebhookResourceAction

    Enumeration of:

    • ADDED
    • REMOVED
    • CHANGED

    WebhookResourceType

    Enumeration of:

    • RESELLER_REGISTRANT
    • SALES_LEAD
    • SALES_OPPORTUNITY
    • QUOTE
    • COMPANY
    • SUBSCRIPTION
    • PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT
    • USER
    • MEMBERSHIP
    • DISCOUNT
    • ORDER
    • CATALOG_PRODUCT
    • PLATFORM
    • APP_ASSIGNMENT
    • INVOICE
    • STAGING_PRODUCT
    • LEAD

    WebhookResource

    {
  "content": {},
  "type": "DISCOUNT",
  "url": "...",
  "uuid": "..."
}
    Property Type Description
    content object
    type WebhookResourceType
    url string
    uuid string

    WebhookScope

    Enumeration of:

    • PARTNER
    • COMPANY

  "entry": [
    {},
    {}
  ]
}
    Property Type Description
    entry array of object
    Shell HTTP JavaScript Node.JS Python Ruby Java
